QuestData.Title: Cutting Your Teeth
QuestData.Description: It's nice that you've been helping out Toshley and his scientists. I, however, do not have the luxury of indulging in my 'personal' interests.$B$BIf you want to make a difference around here, you'll do what I ask of you, and right now, I need weapons.$B$BOur guns are effective at range, but when the bugs get in close, we need to have powerful melee weapons as a backup.$B$BThe teeth of the daggermaw lashtails in the northern part of the Razor Ridge make for great vibro-weapon blades. Scare me up some.
QuestData.CompletionText: How's that collection of teeth coming along?$B$BI'm sure that you're going to do a fine job of getting them for us. While you're doing that, we'll just hold down the outpost here.
QuestData.RewardText: Good work, kid. All of the pain is worth it if even one of my soldiers' lives is saved by your efforts.$B$BI think you should benefit from your sweat and tears, too. Since we're going to have a new batch of weapons soon, why don't you take one of mine?
